ProjectTitle: High-performance membranes for separation of key industrial gas streams
InitialFeedbackHistory:
22/06/2022
4. Metadata: Are your instruments collecting any metadata with your measurements, for example CXI for XRD (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.9h5j8c)? 
5. Storing data on personal devices is risky, you can make a backup on KU Leuven onedrive, or contact your local IT team to discuss other secure solutions. 
7. Sharing: Have you considered any specific repositories? You can use KU Leuven RDR instead (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or domain specific repositories, f1000 research gives good recommendations https://f1000research.com/for-authors/data-guidelines
You can always contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be if you like to learn more about metadata and data repositories
label: good with suggestions
